content: crochet yourself a sick scarf p the rainbow barf scarf is worked up in dk 3 weight yarn and 3mm & 5 5mm hooks and measures an approx 180cm/70 inches in length the pattern is also customisable so you can have a longer/shorter scarf if you wish in any weight yarn you choose rainbow barf scarf is an adventurous-beginner friendly pattern requiring basic crochet stitches as well as 3rd loop half_double_crochet crocheting around a chain and crocheting pieces together feel free to sell a small number of rainbow barf scarfs online at craft fairs etc i just ask for a credit as the pattern designer many thanks thank you for taking a look at the rainbow barf scarf
